title: Question:
author: ingiltere
content: -The last champion is Galatasaray. They have to protect the title.-New season there will be 20 teams competing in Super League.-Giresunspor and Ümraniyespor are relegated.-Samsunspor, Çaykur Rizespor and Pendikspor are promoted.Old thread: Turkish Super League 2022/23 Season

comments.author: LDL
comments.created_time: June 24, 2023, 10:09:47 AMLast edit: June 24, 2023, 10:23:39 AM by LDL
comments.body: Welcome to the New thread... Turkish Super League 2023/24My favourite club Fenerbahçe.Galatasaray 23 titlesFenerbahçe 19 titles Besiktas 16 titlesTrabzonspor 7 titlesIstanbul Basaksehir 1 titleBursaspor 1 title

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Galatasaray was the strongest team last season but I think Fenerbahce will be back this year and winning the title,their problem the last season were inconsistency and some failed games no one would have expected of them,this resulting in Galatasaray winning the title as they did not make as many errors as Fenerbahce did.This last season was not good at all for Turkish teams in European competitions compared to what they are able to achieve usually and I think in this upcoming Champions League season Galatasaray needs to go past group stages or at least to go to Europa League direct elimination stage as a minimum.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on June 24, 2023, 10:55:34 AMGalatasaray was the strongest team last season but I think Fenerbahce will be back this year and winning the title,their problem the last season were inconsistency and some failed games no one would have expected of them,this resulting in Galatasaray winning the title as they did not make as many errors as Fenerbahce did.This last season was not good at all for Turkish teams in European competitions compared to what they are able to achieve usually and I think in this upcoming Champions League season Galatasaray needs to go past group stages or at least to go to Europa League direct elimination stage as a minimum.Fenerbahce made error or not, the club started with zero points as Galatasaray started. There would be some weakness in the other clubs before a club can win a title. It would have been said to be a mistake if Galatasaray won with just 1 or 2 points ahead of Fenerbahce, but Galatasaray won with 8 points. That is still huge, even if not that huge. Be it Fenerbahce make error or not, Galatasaray won before the 36 matches played. About going for Champions League, Galatasaray will have to play champions league qualification which I thought is not a group stage but rather a knockout stage, or am I wrong?. While Fenerbahce, Besiktas and Adana Demirspor will play for Europa League qualification.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on June 24, 2023, 11:47:06 AMFenerbahce made error or not, the club started with zero points as Galatasaray started. There would be some weakness in the other clubs before a club can win a title. It would have been said to be a mistake if Galatasaray won with just 1 or 2 points ahead of Fenerbahce, but Galatasaray won with 8 points. That is still huge, even if not that huge. Be it Fenerbahce make error or not, Galatasaray won before the 36 matches played. About going for Champions League, Galatasaray will have to play champions league qualification which I thought is not a group stage but rather a knockout stage, or am I wrong?. While Fenerbahce, Besiktas and Adana Demirspor will play for Europa League qualification.I agree that Fenerbahce made some errors! That does not mean Galatasaray should be taken lightly. They have won more titles than any other team in this league. They too have a good defensive record and I think in soccer defense plays an important role. What you wrote is correct Galatasaray won by 8 points, that according to me is a good margin. They would have to play in the qualification round of the Championship league and as per analysis I feel they would qualify.

comments.author: execijutiere
comments.body: In the new season, it will be exciting for 2 Black Sea teams to be promoted to the league as an extra.I especially wanted samsunspor to be promoted and they managed to get promoted.Giresunspor said goodbye to the league, but 2 more teams were added instead.We can say that Fenerbahçe is the team that started the transfer season active and well.There is no one who does not know that Ali Koç will follow a transfer policy by taking everything into consideration in the last year of his presidential term.If a good success comes this year, maybe he will continue his way with the congress next year.

comments.author: flipme
comments.body: Galatasaray will definitely be the biggest championship candidate of the new season because they will be able to maintain their squad significantly. Beşiktaş will play with the same squad in the next season. However, Enner Valencia, who scored 32 goals in Fenerbahçe last season, left the team. In addition, the press is talking about the possibility of Arda Güler being transferred to another team. Of course, Fenerbahçe will have the same championship chance as Galatasaray and Beşiktaş, but they will have many shortcomings. They don't even have a coach yet. Jesus left the team. It is not clear which tactic the team will play next season. I think Fenerbahçe will start the season with a disadvantage.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on June 24, 2023, 10:55:34 AMGalatasaray was the strongest team last season but I think Fenerbahce will be back this year and winning the title,their problem the last season were inconsistency and some failed games no one would have expected of them,this resulting in Galatasaray winning the title as they did not make as many errors as Fenerbahce did.This last season was not good at all for Turkish teams in European competitions compared to what they are able to achieve usually and I think in this upcoming Champions League season Galatasaray needs to go past group stages or at least to go to Europa League direct elimination stage as a minimum.But somehow for next season I doubt Fenerbahce can be consistent, they lost their great striker and if I'm not mistaken that's Enner Valencia on 12 June 2023 this man signed a three-year contract with the Internacional club, so for next season Fenerbahce not have goal machine, which will be able to help them to get the title. Galatasaray also seems like they will lose their striker, Mauro Icardi whose loan status will end this month, and maybe he will return to PSG because at this time I've not found any new information about that man.

comments.author: xzone
comments.body: Congratulations to Galatasaray, the champion of the previous season. Due to the earthquake, football remained in the background for a long time in our country and it was not very enjoyable. On top of that, the decisions taken by the federation lowered the motivation of many people.I hope we have a more enjoyable year next season. I hope it will be a high quality football season.It is always good to have a high number of Anatolian teams in the league. I wish success to the Çaykur Rizespor and Samsunspor included in our league, they will add color to the league

comments.author: karabiber
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on June 24, 2023, 10:55:34 AMGalatasaray was the strongest team last season but I think Fenerbahce will be back this year and winning the title,their problem the last season were inconsistency and some failed games no one would have expected of them,this resulting in Galatasaray winning the title as they did not make as many errors as Fenerbahce did.This last season was not good at all for Turkish teams in European competitions compared to what they are able to achieve usually and I think in this upcoming Champions League season Galatasaray needs to go past group stages or at least to go to Europa League direct elimination stage as a minimum.I don't think Fenerbahce will be the champion in the 23-24 season and they have already proven how much they want the championship by getting Dzeko. Fenerbahce should have gone to the new season with a change of chairman and revision but this is a situation that will not happen. Unsuccessful people love their seats in Turkey. The fact that Fenerbahce could not be a champion for a long time seems to have upset the balance of the team. Therefore they do not stop making different wrong decisions every year. I believe that Galatarasay will start the new season stronger with the reinforcements they will make to their squad and they will get the Champions League ticket.

comments.author: Webetcoins
comments.body: I think it's obvious that Fenerbahce is dealing with a good transfer window so far, getting Dzeko and Kent surely shows that they mean business this time around, they already improved on their team from the existing squad. On the other hand, Galatasaray is trying not to lose their players let alone get new better ones, they are trying to be not worse than this season.When you look at that two things together, you realize that one team is on their heel trying to defend, and the other team is on offense and trying to be much better. Seeing how the league ended pretty close anyway, I feel like maybe there is a chance Fenerbahce could win it this year. Or at the very least, they "should", unless something happens with the team of course, we need to wait and see first.

comments.author: püsür
comments.body: Quote from: Webetcoins on June 24, 2023, 06:52:59 PMI think it's obvious that Fenerbahce is dealing with a good transfer window so far, getting Dzeko and Kent surely shows that they mean business this time around, they already improved on their team from the existing squad. On the other hand, Galatasaray is trying not to lose their players let alone get new better ones, they are trying to be not worse than this season.When you look at that two things together, you realize that one team is on their heel trying to defend, and the other team is on offense and trying to be much better. Seeing how the league ended pretty close anyway, I feel like maybe there is a chance Fenerbahce could win it this year. Or at the very least, they "should", unless something happens with the team of course, we need to wait and see first.I believe Dzeko came to Turkey to live his retirement days in return for a very large bonus. This man was born on March 17, 1986. He will turn 38 before the end of next season. When his contract with Fenerbahçe expires, he will be 39 years old... and yes, they have hope in this man. If he gets injured, his football life will almost end. Is this guy transferable? Yes, could be beneficial. But not for that much money and as a savior. But the president is trying to show him off as the transfer of the year. The man is a striker who played in the CL final. I don't see it as good or bad. But he is obviously a winner, they got a star striker even though old. Fenerbahce's biggest shortcoming in recent years is definitely the lack of winner mentality players.

comments.author: Pierre 2
comments.body: Another bitter season for Fenerbahçe. They still spend a lot of money expecting to win title and new star (that you win at every 5th championship). I think this year will be just another year Turkish teams will be suffering under current financial situation. They may be able to build mediocre squads. Teams like Trabzonspor which was very unsuccessful will definitely have issues. Some things are good tho. League is enjoyable to watch in my opinion.

comments.author: execijutiere
comments.body: Quote from: karabiber on June 24, 2023, 05:09:04 PMI don't think Fenerbahce will be the champion in the 23-24 season and they have already proven how much they want the championship by getting Dzeko. Fenerbahce should have gone to the new season with a change of chairman and revision but this is a situation that will not happen. Unsuccessful people love their seats in Turkey. The fact that Fenerbahce could not be a champion for a long time seems to have upset the balance of the team. Therefore they do not stop making different wrong decisions every year. I believe that Galatarasay will start the new season stronger with the reinforcements they will make to their squad and they will get the Champions League ticket.Normally, Ali Koç's presidential term is not over and there is no presidential candidate at the moment, so there is no extraordinary election.Since there will be a presidential election next year, we can say that he has another chance for one more year.He needs to make good use of this chance, otherwise it does not seem that he will be able to continue in the presidency for much longer.He has already added 2 offensive players to the squad and the most important thing is that he will try to keep Arda Güler in the team. If he stays in the team for one more year, it can be very good for both sides.He needs to achieve success this year by sacrificing everything.Otherwise he will continue to be remembered as one of the worst presidents in history.

comments.author: Ondekinecakabilirim
comments.body: Galatasaray's biggest problem will be the striker zone next season. Icardi's contract with Galatasaray has expired. And making a new deal with Icardi is very expensive for Galatasaray. We will probably transfer another striker to replace Icardi. But we will protect the player squad to a great extent. Goalkeeper Muslera is getting old now. We need to transfer a good goalkeeper who can wait behind him. On defense, Nelsson and Abdulkerim are a good duo. Nelsson is under the watchful eye of European teams. If he is not sold in the summer transfer window, we will not have any problems in defense next season. Mertens, Torreira and Kerem in the midfield are enough for the Turkish league. I hope Zaniolo will fit in well or we will make a good striker transfer just like we did with Icardi. As a Galatasaray fan, my candidate for the championship in the new season is Galatasaray.

comments.author: jakdanyel
comments.body: Quote from: execijutiere on June 25, 2023, 06:52:40 AMNormally, Ali Koç's presidential term is not over and there is no presidential candidate at the moment, so there is no extraordinary election.Since there will be a presidential election next year, we can say that he has another chance for one more year.He needs to make good use of this chance, otherwise it does not seem that he will be able to continue in the presidency for much longer.He has already added 2 offensive players to the squad and the most important thing is that he will try to keep Arda Güler in the team. If he stays in the team for one more year, it can be very good for both sides.He needs to achieve success this year by sacrificing everything.Otherwise he will continue to be remembered as one of the worst presidents in history.Ali Koç said that he would be ready for an early election in case of there is a demand for that. But as you have also said there is no candidate against him now. Some people must have talked to Aziz Yıldırım to convince him to be a candidate for the presidency again. But he asked to be left alone as he wasn't thinking of taking such action anymore. I'm sure there would be so many Fenerbahce supporters who would like to see him back. Because Fenerbahce's years in his presidency were much more successful than this as you can remember.

comments.author: execijutiere
comments.body: Quote from: jakdanyel on June 25, 2023, 09:45:10 AMQuote from: execijutiere on June 25, 2023, 06:52:40 AMNormally, Ali Koç's presidential term is not over and there is no presidential candidate at the moment, so there is no extraordinary election.Since there will be a presidential election next year, we can say that he has another chance for one more year.He needs to make good use of this chance, otherwise it does not seem that he will be able to continue in the presidency for much longer.He has already added 2 offensive players to the squad and the most important thing is that he will try to keep Arda Güler in the team. If he stays in the team for one more year, it can be very good for both sides.He needs to achieve success this year by sacrificing everything.Otherwise he will continue to be remembered as one of the worst presidents in history.Ali Koç said that he would be ready for an early election in case of there is a demand for that. But as you have also said there is no candidate against him now. Some people must have talked to Aziz Yıldırım to convince him to be a candidate for the presidency again. But he asked to be left alone as he wasn't thinking of taking such action anymore. I'm sure there would be so many Fenerbahce supporters who would like to see him back. Because Fenerbahce's years in his presidency were much more successful than this as you can remember.The team is moving according to Ali Koç's structure and Ali Koç tried to make such a move because he knows better that he has 1 year as president. We don't know exactly, but it seems that we will see Ali Koç at the head of Fenerbahçe for 1 more year.Aziz Yıldırım spoke very clearly after his last press conference and said that there is no possibility for him to run for the presidency like before, but there are names he likes and respects, if they announce their presidential candidacy, he stated that he will support them to the end.We need to compare the first 5 years of the two presidents for this. We cannot clearly say that ali koç is more unsuccessful than Aziz Yıldırım.

comments.author: CLS63
comments.body: Quote from: execijutiere on June 25, 2023, 10:15:05 AMThe team is moving according to Ali Koç's structure and Ali Koç tried to make such a move because he knows better that he has 1 year as president. We don't know exactly, but it seems that we will see Ali Koç at the head of Fenerbahçe for 1 more year.Aziz Yıldırım spoke very clearly after his last press conference and said that there is no possibility for him to run for the presidency like before, but there are names he likes and respects, if they announce their presidential candidacy, he stated that he will support them to the end.We need to compare the first 5 years of the two presidents for this. We cannot clearly say that ali koç is more unsuccessful than Aziz Yıldırım.They must be wanted to say Ali Koç isn't close to Aziz Yıldırım's success level in terms of the number of championships Fenerbahçe won so far. When it comes to this topic I can also say that there is a huge difference between these two presidents. Because Ali Koç won his first title in his career here which has been just taken in the Turkish Cup. But in Aziz Yıldırım's time Fenerbahçe won 11 titles in total and 6 of them were Super League titles. This is a really impressive success compared to these days.Besides I have read on a Turkish news source that Aziz Yıldırım is ready to be a candidate if there is nobody else.

comments.author: Docnaster
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on June 24, 2023, 12:07:06 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on June 24, 2023, 11:47:06 AMFenerbahce made error or not, the club started with zero points as Galatasaray started. There would be some weakness in the other clubs before a club can win a title. It would have been said to be a mistake if Galatasaray won with just 1 or 2 points ahead of Fenerbahce, but Galatasaray won with 8 points. That is still huge, even if not that huge. Be it Fenerbahce make error or not, Galatasaray won before the 36 matches played. About going for Champions League, Galatasaray will have to play champions league qualification which I thought is not a group stage but rather a knockout stage, or am I wrong?. While Fenerbahce, Besiktas and Adana Demirspor will play for Europa League qualification.I agree that Fenerbahce made some errors! That does not mean Galatasaray should be taken lightly. They have won more titles than any other team in this league. They too have a good defensive record and I think in soccer defense plays an important role. What you wrote is correct Galatasaray won by 8 points, that according to me is a good margin. They would have to play in the qualification round of the Championship league and as per analysis I feel they would qualify.Undoubtedly, Galatasaray is the most successful club in the history of Turkish Football but I think Fenerbahce made some huge errors last season that are very much avoidable.The Turkish league only has one slot for UEFA Champions League qualification because of their ranking in the UEFA Leagues and that means that Galatasaray will represent them come next season in the UEFA Champions League competition. Last season is over already and the new season is yet to kick off. So I think Fenerbahce can still learn from last season and make next season a memorable one for the club's fans

comments.author: Balmain
comments.body: Galatasaray showed a good game last season and won the championship with the right transfers and under the control of Okan Buruk. Due to the great disaster in our country in the last weeks of the season, the league stopped and we tried to heal the wounds as a whole country, and the decisions taken by the federation were not quite right. It is very important for Galatasaray to make a few important transfers this season, as a result, it is necessary to take a few names to the team after the championship. If a middle ground is found for Icardi, he proved a more than enough striker last season, if he can stay in the team, I'm sure we will see better this season. It would also be nice to see two solid forwards like Dzeko and Icardi in the league.
